segments.text: Do you have any special skills ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can write computer programs , I have a good command of secretarial skills .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a doctor license and a driving license .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you get special training in office skills ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I passed both the Cambridge Examinations ( First Certificate and the Certificate of Proficiency in English ); and studied for a year in London at the Lucas Secretarial College , ending with speeds of 120 words per minute in English shorthand and 50 words per minute in typing . I was also trained in office procedure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please tell me about work you have done , which qualifies you for this job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve received some special training in typing , shorthand and operating a fax machine , etc .. I ’ m experienced in IBM-PC . I can operate familiarly a word-processor , a fax machine , a photo and other office equipment .
segments.speaker: S2
